TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TcpStatistics extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 統計資料。

span.span: Provides Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) statistical data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的執行個體所傳回和方法，讓應用程式存取 TCP 流量的資訊。Instances of this class are returned by the and methods, to give applications access to TCP traffic information. 這個類別中的資訊與相互關聯中所述的管理資訊物件[ https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2012.txt ](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2012.txt)。The information in this class correlates to the management information objects described in [https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2012.txt](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2012.txt). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示指定的位址系列的 TCP 統計資料。The following code example displays the TCP statistics for the specified address family. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以呼叫這個建構函式只能由衍生自的類別。This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ConnectionsAccepted As Long
public: abstract property long ConnectionsAccepted { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已接受的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 連線要求數目。

span.span: Gets the number of accepted Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connection requests.

value.span: 值，指定已接受的 TCP 連線要求總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of TCP connection requests accepted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IETF RFC 2012 正式定義此值為"次數 TCP 連線對直接轉換收到的同步處理狀態從待命狀態。 」IETF RFC 2012 formally defines this value as, "The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the SYN-RCVD state from the LISTEN state." ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示連接資訊。The following code example displays connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ConnectionsInitiated As Long
public: abstract property long ConnectionsInitiated { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得用戶端所提出的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 連線要求數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connection requests made by clients.

value.span: 值，指定用戶端所啟始的 TCP 連線總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of TCP connections initiated by clients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IETF RFC 2012 正式定義此值為"次數 TCP 連線對直接轉換 SYN 傳送的狀態從關閉的狀態。 」IETF RFC 2012 formally defines this value as, "The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the SYN-SENT state from the CLOSED state." ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示連接資訊。The following code example displays connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property CumulativeConnections As Long
public: abstract property long CumulativeConnections { long get(); };

summary.span: 指定已建立的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 連線總數。

span.span: Specifies the total number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connections established.

value.span: 值，指定已建立的連線總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of connections established.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示連接資訊。The following code example displays connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property CurrentConnections As Long
public: abstract property long CurrentConnections { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 連線數目。

span.span: Gets the number of current Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connections.

value.span: 值，指定目前的 TCP 連線總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of current TCP connections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IETF RFC 2012 正式定義此值為"TCP 連線的目前狀態是 ESTABLISHED 或關閉等候的數目。 」IETF RFC 2012 formally defines this value as, "The number of TCP connections for which the current state is either ESTABLISHED or CLOSE-WAIT." ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示連接資訊。The following code example displays connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ErrorsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long ErrorsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 錯誤數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) errors received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的 TCP 錯誤總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of TCP errors received.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示連接資訊。The following code example displays connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property FailedConnectionAttempts As Long
public: abstract property long FailedConnectionAttempts { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已失敗的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 連線嘗試數目。

span.span: Gets the number of failed Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connection attempts.

value.span: 值，指定已失敗的 TCP 連線嘗試總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of failed TCP connection attempts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IETF RFC 2012 正式定義此值為"次數 TCP 連線已直接轉換為已關閉狀態從 SYN 傳送狀態或收到的同步處理狀態，再加上的 TCP 連線對直接轉換接聽的次數狀態從收到的同步處理狀態。 」IETF RFC 2012 formally defines this value as, "The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the CLOSED state from either the SYN-SENT state or the SYN-RCVD state, plus the number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the LISTEN state from the SYN-RCVD state." ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示連接資訊。The following code example displays connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MaximumConnections As Long
public: abstract property long MaximumConnections { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得支援的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 連線的最大數目。

span.span: Gets the maximum number of supported Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connections.

value.span: 值，指定可支援的 TCP 連線總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of TCP connections that can be supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果最大連接數目是動態的這個屬性會傳回-1。If the maximum number of connections is dynamic, this property returns -1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示逾時和最大的連接資訊。The following code example displays time-out and maximum connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#5)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MaximumTransmissionTimeout As Long
public: abstract property long MaximumTransmissionTimeout { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 區段的最大重新傳輸逾時值。

span.span: Gets the maximum retransmission time-out value for Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments.

value.span: 值，指定 TCP 實作允許之重新傳輸逾時值的最大毫秒數。

span.span: An value that specifies the maximum number of milliseconds permitted by a TCP implementation for the retransmission time-out value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個輸出區段傳遞到網路層級 (IP) 時，TCP 會啟動重新傳輸計時器。TCP starts a retransmission timer when each outbound segment is passed to the network layer (IP). 如果未收到收條區段中資料的計時器到期之前，會重新傳輸區段。If no acknowledgement is received for the data in the segment before the timer expires, the segment is retransmitted. 計時器可以設為之間的任何值值和值。The timer can be set to any value between the value and the value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示逾時和最大的連接資訊。The following code example displays time-out and maximum connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#5)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MinimumTransmissionTimeout As Long
public: abstract property long MinimumTransmissionTimeout { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 區段的最小重新傳輸逾時值。

span.span: Gets the minimum retransmission time-out value for Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments.

value.span: 值，指定 TCP 實作允許之重新傳輸逾時值的最小毫秒數。

span.span: An value that specifies the minimum number of milliseconds permitted by a TCP implementation for the retransmission time-out value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個輸出區段傳遞到網路層級 (IP) 時，TCP 會啟動重新傳輸計時器。TCP starts a retransmission timer when each outbound segment is passed to the network layer (IP). 如果未收到收條區段中資料的計時器到期之前，會重新傳輸區段。If no acknowledgement is received for the data in the segment before the timer expires, the segment is retransmitted. 計時器可以設為之間的任何值計時器值和值。The timer The timer can be set to any value between the value and the value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示逾時和最大的連接資訊。The following code example displays time-out and maximum connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#5)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ResetConnections As Long
public: abstract property long ResetConnections { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 連線已收到的 RST 封包數目。

span.span: Gets the number of RST packets received by Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connections.

value.span: 值，指定重設 TCP 連線的總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of reset TCP connections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IETF RFC 2012 正式定義此值為"次數 TCP 連線已直接轉換為已關閉狀態從 ESTABLISHED 狀態或關閉等候狀態。 」IETF RFC 2012 formally defines this value as, "The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the CLOSED state from either the ESTABLISHED state or the CLOSE-WAIT state." ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示連接資訊。The following code example displays connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ResetsSent As Long
public: abstract property long ResetsSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已傳送且設定了重設旗標的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 區段數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments sent with the reset flag set.

value.span: 值，指定已傳送且設定了重設旗標的 TCP 區段總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of TCP segments sent with the reset flag set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用重設 (RST) 控制位元的 TCP 標頭中指定 TCP 重設。TCP resets are specified using the reset (RST) control bit in the TCP header. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示片段資訊。The following code example displays segment information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#7)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SegmentsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long SegmentsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已收到的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 區段數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments received.

value.span: 值，指定已收到的 TCP 區段總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of TCP segments received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此資料包含具有錯誤的區段和目前建立的連接上收到的區段。This data includes segments with errors and segments received on currently established connections. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示片段資訊。The following code example displays segment information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#7)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SegmentsResent As Long
public: abstract property long SegmentsResent { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已重新傳送的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 區段數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments re-sent.

value.span: 值，指定已重新傳送的 TCP 區段總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of TCP segments retransmitted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不會認可為在目的地所收到的 TCP 區段會重新傳送。TCP segments that are not acknowledged as being received at the destination are retransmitted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示片段資訊。The following code example displays segment information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#7)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SegmentsSent As Long
public: abstract property long SegmentsSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得已傳送的傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 區段數目。

span.span: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments sent.

value.span: 值，指定已傳送的 TCP 區段總數。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of TCP segments sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項資料會包含目前已建立連線所傳送的區段，但不包含區段包含只重新傳輸的八位元。This data includes segments sent for currently established connections but does not include segments containing only retransmitted octets. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示片段資訊。The following code example displays segment information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#7)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#7)]
